name: Cube Gaem
description:
voidable has come to bring you his first game!

Cube Game

--Description--

cube gaem is about a cube sliding down a lane while visiting 5 different levels! Volume adjustments, resolution changes, and Fullscreen is supported. ONLY WINDOWS is supported (sorry)

--Installation--

Download the ZIP file, extract the file, click on ' Rougelike gaemy.exe'

and play!

ty,

voidable
